noAuthorizationsYet: You don't have any authorizations for this resource type yet
authorizationDescription: Authorizations define access permissions for different resources. Create an authorization by selecting an owner, resource, and at least one permission.

deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the following authorization:
createAuthorizationIntroduction: Define the permissions granted to an owner for a specific resource.

permissionRequired: Please select at least one permission
